text: Xo phu thi sraththa thanghlay cng xya pen chen brrda phu thi ptiseth sraththa læa klaw kæ phwkphxng khxng phwk khea khna thi khea hela nan deinthang pi nı phun phændin hrux khna thi khea hela nan pen nakrb wa hak phwk khea xyu thi rea læw phwk khea k yxm mi tay læa mi thuk kha pheux wa xallxhˌ ca thrng hı reuxng nan pen thi sera sok nı hawcı khxng phwk khea læa xallxhˌ nan thrng hı pen læa hı tay læa xallxhˌ pen phuthrng hen nı sing thi phwk cea kratha kan
